seo.title: SustainSage | Bilingual ICF-aligned coaching
seo.description: SustainSage offers UK-based, ICF-aligned coaching in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese. We partner with mid-career professionals, returners, newcomers, and graduates to design confident transitions.

hero.title: Bilingual coaching for UK transitions that honour your pace
hero.subtitle: We create calm, culturally aware coaching spaces in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese. Together we design small experiments that help you test possibilities without losing what matters to you.

whoWeHelp.title: Who we support
whoWeHelp.intro: Our clients are rebuilding direction while navigating UK workplaces and Chinese cultural wisdom. Every partnership is co-designed so you stay in choice.

cards.title: Mid-career professionals
cards.description: Pause the rush, reconnect with your values, and test sustainable moves before you commit to the next role.

cards.title: Returners after a career break
cards.description: Ease back into work with bilingual support that rebuilds confidence and routines at a pace that respects caregiving and wellbeing.

cards.title: Newcomers settling in the UK
cards.description: Translate between British workplace norms and Chinese cultural expectations while choosing actions that feel authentic.

cards.title: Graduates and early-career explorers
cards.description: Turn uncertainty into low-risk experiments so you learn from each step instead of waiting for the perfect answer.

howCoachingWorks.title: How coaching flows
howCoachingWorks.intro: Coaching stays client-led. We blend reflective questions, cultural translation, and practical experiments that you consent to before trying.

steps.title: 1. Chemistry chat
steps.description: A 20-minute bilingual conversation to sense-fit, discuss language preferences, and clarify what support feels respectful.

steps.title: 2. Coaching cycles
steps.description: 4–6 sessions of 50–60 minutes. You set the focus; we listen, reflect, and co-design experiments grounded in ICF competencies.

steps.title: 3. Review and sustain
steps.description: We harvest learning, adjust the pace, and agree next steps—whether that is continuing coaching, pausing, or signposting other services.

whySustainSage.title: Why SustainSage
whySustainSage.intro: Clients choose us when they want a grounded partner who understands cross-cultural transitions and honours informed consent.

pillars.title: Culturally aware facilitation
pillars.description: We switch comfortably between UK and Chinese contexts, helping you name assumptions before they steer decisions.

pillars.title: Experiments over prescriptions
pillars.description: Instead of advice, we help you design small tests that gather evidence for your choices. You decide what to keep.

pillars.title: Clear agreements & confidentiality
pillars.description: Every series begins with scope, data handling, and safeguarding boundaries so you know how we work together.

icfBoundaries.title: ICF ethics and boundaries
icfBoundaries.intro: Coaching is a collaborative, forward-looking process. It is not therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice. We keep your information confidential except where law or safeguarding requires otherwise.
items: You stay in charge of goals, actions, and pacing. We obtain explicit consent for any tools or reflections we introduce.
If therapy or specialist advice seems more appropriate, we will pause and refer or signpost options with your agreement.
Sessions can run in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or a blend—whatever supports your thinking best.

founders.title: Founders
founders.intro: SustainSage was co-founded by ICF coaches who bridge design thinking, facilitation, and community work across the UK and Greater China.

people.bio: Integrates systems thinking with cultural transitions so your experiments stay grounded in real-world constraints.

people.name: Yi-Ling Lai
people.bio: Holds bilingual space for career clarity, values exploration, and confidence that continues beyond each session.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.intro: Curious about our boundaries or how multilingual coaching feels? These answers outline what to expect.

items.question: What does ICF-aligned coaching mean in practice?
items.answer: We contract clearly, keep you in charge of the agenda, and use observations or models only with your permission. Everything traces back to the ICF Code of Ethics.

items.question: Can we mix languages within a session?
items.answer: Yes. Many clients move between English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese in the same conversation to capture nuance.

items.question: Do you provide advice or consultancy?
items.answer: We stay non-directive. When a framework or resource seems useful, we will offer it as an option and you choose how to adapt it.

items.question: How many sessions should I plan for?
items.answer: Most clients start with 4–6 sessions and review progress regularly. You can pause, extend, or conclude whenever it feels right.

items.question: What if coaching is not the right support?
items.answer: If we notice that therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice is needed, we will discuss it and signpost other services respectfully.

cta.title: Ready to explore your next experiment?
cta.body: Book a bilingual chemistry chat to see whether SustainSage is the right partner. We will map what you need, the support you consent to, and any other services that might help.
